PreceptDef.label: despised
PreceptDef.description:
Our colony is only temporary, should we stay it will only be a matter of time before we are unable to defend it, it is better to never gain such comfort.

<color=#E5E54C>Stats:</color>
 - Farming yield: -10%.
 - Gathering yield: +40%.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - This precept will only work when using the vanilla game world system. Vehicles for example won't interact with it. Using other mods such as Caravan Adventure to leave the map won't work either. You need to use vanilla systems.
